interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Ni Hao Kai-Lan: Princess Kai-Lan
Review Date: 2013/06/18
Store: U, Karen Chau  (Director),     Chau, Karen  (Director),     Peters, Jade-Lianna  (Actor)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Movies & TV Holiday Wishlist
Product Description: ['Kai-lan, Rintoo, Tolee and Hoho are playing in the backyard when they get a visit from their superhero friend, the Monkey King, who really needs their help. Will Kai-lan and her friends go on an adventure with the Monkey King and see what they can do? Of course they will! The Monkey King gives them robes to wear that give them special powers to float, jump, and spin in the air! They’ll have to use their special powers – and the viewer’s help – to leap over bamboo forests, travel past a moat of giant bubbles, and find their way into the majestic palaces.']
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Genre': "Children's", 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Peters, Jade-Lianna, U, Karen Chau, Chau, Karen', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Director': 'U, Karen Chau, Chau, Karen', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Actors': 'Peters, Jade-Lianna', 'Studio': 'NIC'}
Review Text: my 4 yr old grandaughter loves these movies.I couldnt find any of them in the stores so I was very glad to be able to find them on the amazon. I like the fact that each one of these kinds of movies teaches  about different cultures and lifestyles in a way that is interesting for little kids.
Review Title: great story line
Rating: 5.0

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Primary Interest**: Strongly inclined towards action and adventure genre movies, with a growing enthusiasm for family-friendly films that engage younger audiences and emphasize cultural education.
- **Shopping Behavior**: Values cost-effectiveness; prefers bulk purchases for savings, frequently opting for multi-packs rather than single items.
- **Content Format Preference**: Enjoys physical media, particularly DVD format, indicating a preference for tangible collections that can be shared with family.
- **Quality Expectations**: Maintains high expectations for shipping speed and product satisfaction, consistently providing positive feedback on purchases.
- **Entertainment Value**: Looks for collections that offer a variety of content; connective experiences with classic animation suggest an interest in nostalgia-driven material suitable for intergenerational viewing.
- **Rating Behavior**: Tends to give high ratings when expectations are met, especially regarding delivery speed, product value, and quality of entertainment. Recent interactions highlight an appreciation for films that educate young audiences about different cultures and lifestyles.
- **Interaction Retrospective**: Displays a commitment to satisfied purchases, particularly in action and family-oriented films, showcasing a balance between personal entertainment and educational value for children.

Overall, the user is an action movie enthusiast expanding their appreciation for content that combines family entertainment with cultural storytelling, while prioritizing value and quality in their shopping choices.
